Eureka.title: Eureka
Eureka.description: Eureka is a hard-difficulty Linux box featuring heap dump analysis, Spring Eureka service SSRF exploitation, command injection in log processing script, and cronjob manipulation for privilege escalation.

TheFrizz.title: TheFrizz
TheFrizz.description: TheFrizz is a medium-difficulty Windows box focusing on exploitation of Gibbon LMS, different ways of gaining access to the machine, deleted archives recovery and GPO abuse for system command execution.

Nocturnal.title: Nocturnal
Nocturnal.description: Nocturnal is an easy-difficulty Linux box involving exploitation of IDOR and command injection vulnerabilities in a file upload application, followed by privilege escalation through CVE-2023-46818 in ISPConfig.

University.title: University
University.description: University is an insane-difficulty Windows machine featuring ReportLab CVE exploitation for initial access, certificate forgery using compromised CA files, lateral movement through network pivoting, malicious lecture uploads, and much more.

Code.title: Code
Code.description: Code is an easy-difficulty Linux box focusing on an online Python code editor, SQLAlchemy database extraction, and privilege escalation through a vulnerable backup script with filter bypass.

Cypher.title: Cypher
Cypher.description: Cypher is a medium-difficulty Linux box featuring cypher injection, OS command execution via Neo4j custom procedures, and privilege escalation through a custom bbot module.

Scepter.title: Scepter
Scepter.description: Scepter is a hard-difficulty Windows box involving enumeration of an NFS share, certificate usage, attribute modification, and abusing ESC14/ESC9 for account takeover.

Dog.title: Dog
Dog.description: Dog is an easy-difficulty Linux box focusing on source code analysis, Backdrop CMS exploitation via arbitrary module installation and RCE, password reuse, and root command execution via bee for root access.

Cat.title: Cat
Cat.description: Cat is a medium-difficulty Linux box focusing on Cross-Site Scripting, git repository dumping, SQL injection, and privilege escalation via XSS-based credential exfiltration from a vulnerable Gitea instance.

Haze.title: Haze
Haze.description: Haze is a hard-difficulty Windows box involving Splunk exploitation, chaining multiple AD permission abuse methods, and SeImpersonatePrivilege abuse via SweetPotato for SYSTEM access.

Titanic.title: Titanic
Titanic.description: Titanic is an easy-difficulty Linux box focusing on LFI, Gitea database extraction, hash transformation and RCE via ImageMagick CVE-2024-41817.

Infiltrator.title: Infiltrator
Infiltrator.description: Infiltrator is an insane-dificulty Windows machine featuring many AD escalation methods, Output Messenger exploitation, chat log reading via API, reverse shell via calendar functionality and much more.

Backfire.title: Backfire
Backfire.description: Backfire is a medium-difficulty Linux box focusing on C2 server exploitation(Havoc, HardHat), ssh key injection for persistence and iptables comment abuse for root.

Checker.title: Checker
Checker.description: Checker is a hard-difficulty Linux box involving Teampass SQL injection for credential extraction, Bookstack SSRF-LFI, binary reverse engineering, and TOCTOU shared memory poisoning for privilege escalation.

Reddish.title: Reddish
Reddish.description: Reddish is an insane-difficulty Linux box with an emphasis on tunneling and manual enumeration without standard tools, featuring Node-RED exploitation, Redis abuse, rsync wildcard injection and cronjob manipulation.

EscapeTwo.title: EscapeTwo
EscapeTwo.description: EscapeTwo is an easy-difficulty Windows box featuring XLSX file extraction, MSSQL command execution via xp_cmdshell, cert template modification and an ESC4-ESC1 certificate attack.

Heal.title: Heal
Heal.description: Heal is a medium-difficulty Linux box featuring subdomain enumeration, PDF export LFI vulnerability, credential extraction, LimeSurvey RCE exploitation, and privilege escalation via Consul service vulnerability.

UnderPass.title: UnderPass
UnderPass.description: UnderPass is an easy-difficulty Linux box featuring UDP enumeration, daloradius service discovery, hash cracking, and privilege escalation via mosh-server sudo permissions.

BigBang.title: BigBang
BigBang.description: BigBang is a hard-difficulty Linux box involving WordPress plugin exploitation, Docker-based MySQL access, Grafana hash cracking, and an APK-based command injection.

Vintage.title: Vintage
Vintage.description: Vintage is a hard-difficulty Windows box focused on permission abuse, GMSA secrets, DPAPI decryption, and delegation-based privilege escalation.

Administrator.title: Administrator
Administrator.description: Administrator is a medium-difficulty Windows box featuring Active Directory exploitation through a chain of user permissions, targeted kerberoasts and DCsync.

LinkVortex.title: LinkVortex
LinkVortex.description: LinkVortex is an easy-difficulty Linux box featuring fuzzing, exposed Git repos, Ghost CMS exploitation, and creative symlink-based privilege escalation.

Ghost.title: Ghost
Ghost.description: Ghost is an insane-difficulty Windows box featuring LDAP authentication bypass, LFI, DNS poisoning, Kerberos exploitation, Golden SAML attack, linked SQL server abuse, and bidirectional trust exploitation.

Cicada.title: Cicada
Cicada.description: Cicada is an easy-difficulty Windows box that focuses on SMB enumeration, password spraying and privilege escalation via SeBackupPrivilege.

Chemistry.title: Chemistry
Chemistry.description: Chemistry is an easy-difficulty Linux box involving CIF file exploitation, weak password hashing and outdated service vulnerabilities.

Alert.title: Alert
Alert.description: Alert is an easy-difficulty Linux box involving Markdown file upload exploitation, XSS-based LFI, credential cracking, and configuration file poisoning for privilege escalation.

Instant.title: Instant
Instant.description: Instant is a medium-difficulty Linux box that challenges users with Android app reverse engineering, API exploitation, and credential decryption.

Certified.title: Certified
Certified.description: Certified is a medium-difficulty Windows box focusing on AD enumeration, shadow credential abuse, and certificate template exploitation.

Yummy.title: Yummy
Yummy.description: Yummy is a hard-difficulty Linux box that challenges users with JWT forgery, SQL injection, misconfigured file privileges, and version control exploitation.

BlockBlock.title: BlockBlock
BlockBlock.description: BlockBlock is a hard-difficulty Linux box involving XSS-based token theft, JSON-RPC exploitation, blockchain transaction analysis, Forge abuse for privesc and Pacman package manipulation.
